tool_description: Competitions, Matches & real-time Odds for the Asian Bookmaker SBOBET.
name: SBOBET
title: SBOBET

api_list.name: Odds
api_list.description: Use the sports, the competition and the matchid from the "Matches" endpoint to get pre-game and live Odds from SBOBET Sportsbook.

api_list.name: Matches
api_list.description: Use the sport and the competition from the "Competitions" endpoint to receive Matches from SBOBET Sportsbook.

api_list.name: Sports
api_list.description: Retrieves all available sports needed for the endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sbobet.p.rapidapi.com/sbobet/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sbobet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sbobet.p.rapidapi.com/sbobet/sports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sbobet.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Competitions
api_list.description: Use the sport to get Competitions from SBOBET Sportsbook.
